freeports_analysis.formats_utils

Utilities of general interest common to all formats and that can be used for creating pdf_filter or text_extract or deserialize functions

Functions

default_if_not_implemented(default_func)

Replace the decorated function with a default given as argument of the decorator if the decorated function raise a NotImplementedError or return None

normalize_string(string[, lower])

Normalize a string by: 1.

normalize_word(word[, lower])

Normalize a word by: 1.

overwrite_if_implemented(primary_func)

Replace the decorated default function with a function given as argument of the decorator if that function do not raise a NotImplementedError or return None
freeports_analysis.formats_utils.default_if_not_implemented(default_func: Callable[[P], R]) → Callable[[P], R]

Replace the decorated function with a default given as argument of the decorator if the decorated function raise a NotImplementedError or return None

Parâmetros:

default_func (Callable[P,R]) – default function

Retorno:

the default function if the deorated function is overwritten, if not the decorated function

Tipo de retorno:

Callable[P,R]

freeports_analysis.formats_utils.normalize_string(string: str, lower: bool = True) → str

Normalize a string by: 1. Stripping leading/trailing whitespace 2. Converting to lowercase if lower 3. Collapsing multiple whitespaces into single spaces

Parâmetros:

  • string (str) – Input string to normalize

  • lower (bool) – Determine if the string has to be lowered

Retorno:

Normalized string

Tipo de retorno:

str

freeports_analysis.formats_utils.normalize_word(word: str, lower: bool = False) → str

Normalize a word by: 1. Stripping leading/trailing whitespace 2. Removing all whitespace between characters 3. Converting to lowercase if lower

Parâmetros:

  • word (str) – Input word to normalize

  • lower (bool) – Determine if the string has to be lowered

Retorno:

Normalized word with no whitespace

Tipo de retorno:

str

freeports_analysis.formats_utils.overwrite_if_implemented(primary_func: Callable[[P], R]) → Callable[[P], R]

Replace the decorated default function with a function given as argument of the decorator if that function do not raise a NotImplementedError or return None

Parâmetros:

primary_func (Callable[P,R]) – implementation of a function

Retorno:

the function given as argument of the decorator if implemented, otherwise the decorated default

Tipo de retorno:

Callable[P,R]

Modules

deserialize

Utils for creating deserialize routines and functions

pdf_filter

Utilities for writing pdf_filter functions.

text_extract

Module for text block processing and extraction in document analysis.
